tagDescription: Correspondence with Clifford and Harold Sifton Concerning The Georgian Bay Canal Co., with reference to the St. Lawrence route, the power stations and dams at Pointe Fortune and Hawkesbury, and the politics of the issue.Includes Copies of Perks' Correspondence with Robert Sir Borden, W.L.Mackenzie King and W.S.Fielding.
